snippet: The attack on President Bashar al-Assad’s security chiefs aligned neatly with a tactical shift by rebels: the swift and successful adoption of makeshift bombs.
abstract: Military analysis; attack on Syrian President Bashar al-Assad’s security chiefs aligns neatly with a tactical shift that has changed the direction of the country's long conflict: the opposition fighters' swift and successful adoption of makeshift bombs; since midspring, anti-Assad fighters have become bolder and sharply more effective with their use.
lead_paragraph: The attack on President Bashar al-Assad’s security chiefs aligned neatly with a tactical shift by rebels: the swift and successful adoption of makeshift bombs.

headline.seo: Syrian Rebels Hone Bomb Skills — Military Analysis
headline.main: Syrian Rebels Hone Bomb Skills to Even the Odds
headline.print_headline: Rebels Hone Explosives Skills to Even the Odds
